definition: (bird species of China) Lady Amherst's pheasant (Chrysolophus amherstiae)
(bird species of China) golden pheasant (Chrysolophus pictus)

sentences.english: The emphasis should be put on %Artemisia% and %Caragana% genera when native sand binding plants are to be selected.
sentences.chinese: 选择乡土固沙植物应将重点放在蒿属和锦鸡儿属上。

sentences.english: The similar intraspecific variations were observed in C. jubata also.
sentences.chinese: 鬼箭锦鸡儿花粉形态也有一定的种内差异。

sentences.english: Studies on the plant genus Caragana of Gansu.
sentences.chinese: 甘肃锦鸡儿属植物的分类及分布。

sentences.english: "They are good to eat, and also their flesh is very delicate, " replied Herbert.
sentences.chinese: “锦鸡很好吃，它们的肉很嫩，”赫伯特回答说。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study anti-inflammatory effect of ethyl acetate extract of Caragana microphylla Lam.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究小叶锦鸡儿醋酸乙酯提取物的抗炎作用。

sentences.english: This paper describes and discusses the captive breeding and growth of Golden pheasant (Chrysolophus pictus) chicks.
sentences.chinese: 对红腹锦鸡的饲养繁殖与生长发育进行了研究和讨论。

sentences.english: ObjectiveTo study the analgesic effects of the ethyl acetate extraction of Caragana microphylla Lam.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨小叶锦鸡儿醋酸乙酯提取物的镇痛作用。
